description:
Advocating on behalf of innocent accident victims and their families throughout Jefferson County and the surrounding areas from our law office in Arnold, Missouri, the attorneys at Brown & Crouppen are prepared to help you secure the maximum amount of compensation for your serious injuries and losses so that you can focus on your recovery.

With more than 50 years of combined legal experience behind us, we possess the skills and resources necessary to handle your personal injury, wrongful death or medical malpractice claim regardless of how complex or challenging your situation is. In addition, we have become one of the region's leading practices for Social Security Disability and workers' compensation claims, and to date, we have recovered more than $850 million in total compensation for our clients.

We promise to remain by your side throughout all legal proceedings to address your questions and concerns as they arise and to ensure we have done all we can to support you and your family during this most difficult time in your life. In recognition of our success, Missouri Lawyers Weekly voted us as the state's "Winningest Plaintiff Law Firm," and we have received many positive reviews and referrals from satisfied clients.

To begin the process of obtaining the finances you need to cover your medical expenses, lost wages and other damages associated with your accident, you can contact Brown & Crouppen by phone or through our law firm's website to schedule a free evaluation of your claim. Offering a no-win guarantee, we will not require a fee from you unless we win your case and secure finances on your behalf.
